v0.0.8, 16 jan 2014 -- Massive radio urls update.
                     - -v and --version parameters added


v0.0.6, 29 aug 2014 -- Updated some radio urls.
                     - --list-all option added
                     - --add/--remove parameters instead of -a/-d


v0.0.5, 30 jul 2014 -- Updated some radio urls.


v0.0.4, 09 apr 2014 -- Added repo uri.


v0.0.3, 09 apr 2014 -- Better instructions in README.


v0.0.2, 09 mar 2014 -- Add/update/delete radios interface.
                     - json radio list instead python dict.


v0.0.1, 08 mar 2014 -- Initial version.
